name: Kick and Run
description:
Kick and Run is a one to four player Football multi directional scrolling arcade game where the pitch is horizontally viewed from above with the screen showing a part of the pitch and players are viewed from the side. Up to two players can control each team.
At the start of the game players have the choice between seven national teams which have different attributes, strengths and weaknesses. In the original arcade a button is used to pass the ball and a pedal to kick it.
